cnt_fill

Functions

cnt_loading_mass(traj_file, molecules, an)

points_in_cylinder(pt1, pt2, r, atom_to_check)

CNTload

class conan.analysis_modules.cnt_fill.CNTload(traj_file, molecules, an)

Bases: object

Class to calculate the loading mass of the liquid within the carbon nanotube.

analyze_frame(split_frame, frame_counter)

Calculate the loading mass of the liquid within the CNTs. For this we first need to calculate the center of geometry for each open end of the CNT. (ring1, ring2)

cnt_loading_mass_prep()

initializes the variables, the number of CNTs and identifies the most outwards atoms of the CNTs.

cnt_loading_mass_processing()

Calculate the loading mass of the liquid within the CNTs.
